metadata.title: CVE-2014-0155 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The ioapic_deliver function in virt/kvm/ioapic.c in the Linux kernelthrough 3.14.1 does not properly validate the kvm_irq_delivery_to_apicreturn value, which allows guest OS users to cause a denial of service(host OS crash) via a crafted entry in the redirection table of an I/OAPIC. NOTE: the affected code was moved to the ioapic_service functionbefore the vulnerability was announced.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0155` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
